document.full_text: a diplomatic row has erupted over a plaque marking last year's plane crash in russia that killed poland's president and 95 others, casting a shadow over sunday's commemoration of disaster's first anniversary.
document.title: plaque row mars polish commemoration of plane crash
lines_and_colors: a diplomatic row has erupted over a plaque marking last year's plane crash in russia that killed poland's president and 95 others, casting a shadow over sunday's commemoration of disaster's first anniversary.
